timeline.message:
BFD related network topology structures renaming

For a more clear representation of hub-AND-spoke approach used in
network topology BFD related classes and packets were renamed.

timeline.bodyText: Why not make "topic" final instead of a new variable?
timeline.author: sergii-iakovenko

replies.bodyText:
Because it is changed for one message type - line 102 :(
I have reworked the way how we manage the response topic into MessageProcessor.
replies.author: surabujin

timeline.bodyText: I'd reconsider the naming for these log methods to help others understand when to use them. E.g. logDebugWithPrefix...
timeline.author: sergii-iakovenko

replies.bodyText: These wrappers are supposed to use for all log requests. Their goal is to identify specific FSM in logs, so they must be used always.
replies.author: surabujin

timeline.message:
BFD logical port's LCM implementation

BFD enable request will lead to creating a logical BFD port if it does
not exist. ISL removal will lead to the removal of logical BFD ports.

Logical BFD ports are created using GRPC speaker and kafka as a
transport.
